item.description:
OK, OK, really last minute with this one... A roughly 2.5 hr. easy looping hike (just mostly gentle rolling trail) at Northwest Park in Windsor. We'll pass through field, forest, and nice evergreen forest with views of the reservoir about half way through.

Meet in the parking lot near the walkway to enter the park (see map) at 10 AM and we'll hike from there and take various trails or portions of trails as conditions allow.

Children and leashed dogs are welcome.

 

General directions:
* From Interstate 91 heading north, take Exit 38. From Interstate 91 heading south, take Exit 38A.
* Turn right at the exit on to Poquonock Avenue (Route 75).
* Go about 1.5 miles and turn left on to Prospect Hill Rd.
* Turn right at the traffic circle on to Lang Road
* Continue up the road to the Nature Center parking lot.

Approximate location/directions (103 Lang Rd., Windsor, CT):
http://www.mapquest.com/maps/%5B76-103%5D+Lang+Rd+Windsor+CT+06095/

Trail map:
http://www.northwestpark.org/pdf/New_NWP_Map.pdf

Northwest Park and programs:
http://www.northwestpark.org/

 

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the walway entrance from the parking lot. I'll be the 6"2" guy with glasses (see my picture on profile).

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: (Short Notice) Winter Hike at Northwest Park in Windsor CT
